attributes.action: Award a Knighthood to Captain Tom Moore
attributes.additional_details: Because no one more than Captain Moore deserves such an honour.
attributes.background: Award a Knighthood to Captain Tom Moore for the selfless act if raising more than 12 million for the NHS during Covid-19

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
